segments.text: What a lovely day . The sun is shinning and the sky is so blue . It's a perfect day to go to the beach and get a beautiful tan .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great idea . Unlike you , I just want to enjoy watching the sea and playing with the sand . I do not want to get a tan because I look good in pale skin .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on . Getting a tan symbolizes health and wealth in western countries .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: While the pale color symbolizes beauty and elegance in most Asia countries .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That is a really interesting fact .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will bring a big hat and apply a lot of sunscreen before setting off the beach .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just do whatever you feel like doing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: ( At the beach ) My bag is so heavy . Let's put the stuff under the tree .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good idea . It is always cooler in a shade .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can't wait to play in the water . My feet are burning when I stand on the sand .
segments.speaker: S2
